name: Cosmic Truths
description:
What if existence itself is not what you thought it was? Take the place of our protagonist, who is about to discover the truth of life, the universe and everything.

Will you be able to get to the store in time?
Will Buddy finally get along with his zoo friends?
Why is your roommate a 2000 year old Greek philosopher?

This and much more will be answered in 'Cosmic Truths'.

A game made for the Adventure Game Challenge Jam

Intro music by Devynn LaShure, Echo Blue Music
Game music by Kevin MacLeod - Incompetech

Buddy and the Zoo Friends is created and animated by Raeleus
